title: Whitney Port nails off-duty style as she grabs cup of Joe with husband Tim Rosenman
text:
She's made a name for herself as a style expert, ever since getting her start as a Teen Vogue intern on The Hills.

But Whitney Port was embracing her laid-back side while picking up a cup of Joe with her husband Tim Rosenman in Los Angeles on Thursday.

Though she had set aside the glamour, Whitney, 34, was still looking cool as she headed to the Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf wearing a fun pair of leopard print leggings with a comfy forest green sweatshirt.

Keeping it casual! Whitney Port embraced her laid-back side while picking up a cup of Joe with her husband Tim Rosenman in Los Angeles on Thursday

The reality star propped on a pair of trendy slim shades over her brown eyes.

In addition to her fresh face, Whitney appeared to have let her dark blonde hair fall down in it's natural loose waves.

Tim appeared to have his hand gently upon her back as they made their way outside of the cafe together.

Now armed with a cup of coffee, Whitney looked ready to take on the day.

Pep in her step: Port looked ready to take on the day, now that she had her cup of Joe

Celebrate! The couple are back in Los Angeles after enjoying a weekend getaway to Santa Barbara, where they attended a wedding at the Four Seasons Resort The Biltmore

The couple are back in Los Angeles after enjoying a weekend getaway to Santa Barbara, where they attended a wedding at the Four Seasons Resort The Biltmore.

Whitney posted a slew of glamorous snaps from their wedding weekend attire, including one of herself all dressed up in a sleeveless black dress with pink skirt.

'I'm obsessed,' she captioned the snap of her with her smartly dressed husband.

Eyes only for her: Tim gazed at his wife during their weekend getaway to the Central Coast

Whitney and Tim tied the knot in 2015, several years after first meeting on The Hills spin-off, The City.

At the time, Tim was an associate producer on the show, which centered around Whitney's new life in New York City.

The couple are now parents to two-year-old son Sonny.
description: Though she had set aside the glamour, Whitney was still looking cool as she headed to the Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf wearing a fun pair of leopard print leggings with a comfy forest green sweatshirt.
